About Pizza Hut Pizza Hut is a Fast Food restaurant located at F-7 Markaz in Islamabad, Federal 44500. Pizza Hut has been described as an Amazing Fast Food restaurant and has received an average rating of 9 by our members. Quick Facts
Cuisine: Fast Food Accepts Credit Card: Yes Parking: N/A
Atmosphere: N/A Take Reservations: Yes Serves Alcohol: N/A Smoking Allowed: No
User Reviews for Pizza Hut
All Reviews for Pizza Hut
Usman
September 15, 2008
Food
9
Decor
8
Service
10
I Visit Pizza Hut too often, normally I go to this one in F-7 Markaz, and yeah, food I find here is tasty, after all its all about PIZZA :P, Chicken fajita, Cheese lovers and euro are the pizzas I take usually, and yeah I can eat 2 LARGE easily :P
I Ate:
